channel.title: Rs Gold?
channel.description:
Hello everybody.
I want to buy Rs gold in-order to get back to the game , I thought of buying some gold i searched for websites .. and i have only 20$ to buy by them .. (in paypal) so will anyone suggest a good website? , after my researches i found this website a very good cheap one www.lolga.com .. but yet i dont know if its trusted , can anyone answer me if he tried it , or can suggest better website?
thx much 4 readying and sorry for my "bad grammar"

item.description:

Go to google and type Runescape RSGP and when you click enter their should be a site 1m/60 cents. I used that and their legit.

item.title: Rs Gold?
item.dc:creator: @DevilsCape DevilsCape
item.description:
@DevilsCape wrote:

xd own3d xd:

never buy of those gold sites, they charge waay over what the regular rate is, i have sold over 1b at $.65 / m there are many trusted sellers on smokinelite that sell for around that price too, (didn’t give full site name as i didn’t know if advertising sites is against the rules, just answering the question)

mind if you give me the site name in pm?
